Allow to use Jitsi
Can not connect to video conference server. Please check your internet connection or try again later.
Active conference is not found. Please reload the talk or try to create your own conference.
Use defined domain as Jitsi server
Enable Jitsi chat inside of Jitsi conference
Synchronize Jitsi chat with Messenger history (in this case all messages from Jitsi chat will be duplicated in Messenger history also)
Show chat info (members will be able to see chat room link and share it with non-members)
Enable video conference only for private talks
If indicated some of the errors, dialogs may point to this support URL for help
Enable watermark (Note: If you are using default Jitsi server, you will see original Jitsi watermark). You may read more here about how to install your own deployment.
Jitsi Watermark link (user will be redirected to this link when clicks on watermark)

Sorry, video conference for public talks is not allowed
